contractObjectiveList.description: Attack the Installation and paint the area for a Fire Mission
contractObjectiveList.title: Attack the Installation and Place Beacons for a Fire Mission

dialogueContent.words: My Lord, the mercenary lance is now in the operational area. Opening comms to them.
Ah, yes, Commander. The objective is to place three targeting beacons around the hardened military facility, so that our DropShip can fire its main gun at the base.
Expect enemy forces to interfere with your beacon placement. You will need to protect the beacons for a short time by remaining nearby.
We are on a very short timeline, Commander. Our orbital asset can conceal its signature only for a short time before it will be discovered, after which expect more enemy resistance.
Be aware that when the shot is fired, anything within the shot's effective radius will be obliterated, including any friendly 'Mechs.
Once the facility is destroyed, move to the evacuation point. I await reports of your success, Commander.
By God, that was a show worth watching, Commander. Well done. I'll inform Margrave Joss of the results.
My Lord, we're receiving a report from our spotter in orbit. A large convoy has just departed the capital, and it appears to be heading into the mountains.

Hells, that's the military commander of Claybrooke. She must be fleeing for her safety. This is an opportunity, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}; prepare for immediate deployment! That convoy will be mine!
This is a highly disappointing outcome that reflects poorly on you and your people, Commander.
Argo, this is Gungnir Actual. We have confirmation of target lock. Preparing to fire main gun.
Gungnir, this is Argo Actual. Fire when ready. Commander, get our people clear.
Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.
Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.
Charlie beacon deployed.
This is Base CO Donovan to all Claybrooke units! They're… they're attacking the base with assault-class 'Mechs! Focus your fire and bring them down!
All units, close distance on enemy forces. Move quickly!
Keep the pressure on to deny them a chance to place those beacons!
Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Good effect on target. Targets Destroyed.
Greetings, Commander. Understand that this facility is as important to the {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} as it is to our {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} friends.
Let's see what you got.
*static* -ell, this round is yours. *cough* Until next time.
Ah, Commander, that extra support I promised is arriving now.
Commander, this is LCAF First Lieutenant Langford. My people and I will be assisting you on the field.
Commander, we can't hold out any longer. You're on your own.
Commander, long-range sensors are picking up an enemy bogey. It'll be landing any minute.
I don't have any way to know where the enemy will land, but you can bet it will be close to the base.
My Lord, we have new contacts. Looks like vehicles from a hardened motor pool.
Commander? We can't disable that motor pool except by the orbital strike. I suggest moving more quickly.
Commander, the Gungnir is being hailed by system defense forces, we must act quickly. You're almost out of time.
Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Clear out of this area of operation!
We're holding here for our own reinforcements. Get to your evac point and go! We'll cover you.
CHECK FIRE! CHECK FIRE! FRIENDLIES NOT CLEAR OF IMPACT SITE. OH---
Warning: Incoming artillery fire.
Commander, I've got inbound sensor contacts. Expect enemy reinforcements to drop in at any moment.
Inbound kill team, Boss. We've lingered a bit too long and their quick reinforcements are arriving shortly.

longDescription: Move quickly… with assault-class 'Mechs. Commander, this is absurd. I hope they're paying well.

objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Alpha

objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Bravo for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Bravo

objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Charlie
Get Visual Confirmation of the Shot's Effect
Extract before Additional Enemy Reinforcements Arrive

objectiveList.description: Defeat Enemy Air Defense to allow Reinforcements to Land
objectiveList.title: Disable the Antiair Turrets

shortDescription: I approve of your choice of 'Mechs for this mission, Commander. This ought to be just the show of force that Margrave Joss was hoping for. Also, I have additional support to provide, thanks to Kommandant General Plath; you'll need to clear the antiair defenses before the support lance can land, though. Remember: Gungnir, our DropShip, can remain on station to fire at the planet only for a limited time. Move quickly, Commander.
